channel.title: Quest command
channel.description: How would I create a command that allows my character to complete all quests simultaniously? Thanks in advance.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 05:05:19 pm[/size][hr]Also, does anyone have the "hail" command thing, that makes all characters around you bow? I have different emotes I want to replace that with.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 05:19:25 pm[/size][hr]Some help would be nice. :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2008, 05:33:10 pm[/size][hr]Nobody?

item.title: Quest command
item.dc:creator: @roguex roguex
item.description:
@roguex wrote:

Well im guessing your using a delta base so,

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“quests”){
q1 = 15;q2= 15;q3=15;
sM(“Gratulations you have completed all your quests!”);
}

Note: the q’s go up to 11.

Read full topic
